narrator.name: Eliza
narrator.description: AI Guide with brown hair and orange eyes

scenes.narration: Hi, I'm Eliza! Welcome to TON Claude. This is an AI-powered financial assistant that connects Claude AI with the TON blockchain. Let me show you what it can do.
First, let's check your wallet balance. I'll ask Claude to query the blockchain for you.
See how the wallet panel highlights? Claude is retrieving your real-time balance from the TON network. You have 5.234 TON, worth about 8 dollars.
Now let's analyze your spending patterns. Claude can examine your transaction history and give you useful insights.
Watch the transaction panel light up as Claude processes your spending data. It categorizes everything and identifies patterns in your activity.
Let's send some TON. I'll initiate a transfer of half a TON to another wallet.
Claude prepares the transaction and asks for confirmation. This two-step process keeps your funds safe from accidental transfers.
I'll confirm the transaction now. Watch the balance update in real-time!
Transaction confirmed! Notice how the balance animates down and a new transaction appears in your history. That's the blockchain in action.
Claude also supports staking. Let's stake 2 TON to earn some passive income.
The staking badge appears showing your 2 TON staked at 4.5% APY. Your funds are now earning yield on the TON network!
Finally, let's check out your NFT collection. TON has a thriving NFT ecosystem.
The NFT panel highlights, showing your digital collectibles. You can view, transfer, or list them for sale directly through Claude.
And that's TON Claude! An AI assistant that makes blockchain finance accessible, secure, and conversational. Thanks for watching!
